name: The Forest (itch) (Red55555)
description:
You are alone in the woods trying to survive the night alone with only your flashlight.

W,A,S,D to move plus shift to run and left click for the flashlight.

Attention this is very important!!!!

After downloading the zipfile extract it then go to the folder and inside it you will find a folder called The Forest_Data open it then you will find another folder called The Forest_Data, drag the folder and drop it inside the Game Jam folder and this could fix the problem.
